tipsmod.tip.no_tips: No tips have been loaded. Please review the configurations.
tipsmod.tip.undead_damage: Undead are damaged by health potions and healed by damage potions. Subversive!
tipsmod.tip.poison_immune: Zombies, Skeletons, and Spiders are all immune to poison damage.
tipsmod.tip.witch_conversion: Villagers will become witches when struck by lightning.
tipsmod.tip.four_eggs: Hatching chicken eggs can spawn four chickens on very rare occasions.
tipsmod.tip.nether_lava: Lava will spread scarily fast in the nether.
tipsmod.tip.west: The Sun, Moon, and Stars all move towards the west. Cardinal directions!
tipsmod.tip.swamp_slime: Slimes can spawn in swamps during a full moon, and commonly underground in the presence of slime ferns.
tipsmod.tip.deflect_ghast_fireballs: You can deflect Ghast Fireballs by striking them.
tipsmod.tip.shulker_armor: Shulkers take significantly more damage when their shells are open.
tipsmod.tip.arthropods: Bane of arthropods is actually useful now!
tipsmod.tip.fossils: Large fossils are buried under swamps and deserts, and you can find burial sites everywhere.
tipsmod.tip.crouch_blocks: Sneaking/Crouching will prevent you from falling off the side of blocks, unless on an airship or contraption.
tipsmod.tip.smoke_bees: Placing a Campfire beneath a Bee Nest will make those Bees passive. Eepy bees.
tipsmod.tip.lava_fuel: Lava Buckets can be used as fuel in the Furnace. Blazes however, need straws.
tipsmod.tip.wooden_tool_fuel: Old Wooden tools can be used as fuel in the Furnace. Who cares about sentiment?
tipsmod.tip.scrap_nuggets: Most metallic tools/armor can be smelted into nuggets. Crafting loss is a thing!
tipsmod.tip.piglin_gold: Piglins really love gold. It's kind of unhealthy.
tipsmod.tip.dog_health: The lower a dog's tail, the less health they have left. Use an enchanted pet tag to increase their max health.
tipsmod.tip.dog_rotten_flesh: You can heal your dogs by feeding them Rotten Flesh. Kinda gross though, use dog food instead. Jeez.
tipsmod.tip.lure_animals: You can lure animals into following you by holding a food they like, and trap small ones with cage or jar blocks.
tipsmod.tip.cooked_drops: Animals killed by fire damage usually drop cooked food. You monster.
tipsmod.tip.nether_sponge: Wet sponges will immediately dry when placed in the nether. Very little doesn't evaporate there.
tipsmod.tip.boat_passenger: Most boats or aircraft seat two. Unless you build one yourself.
tipsmod.tip.shulker_golem: Shulkers are considered a type of Golem. Gotta catch em' all!
tipsmod.tip.note_block_instrument: The instrument of a Note Block is determined by the block underneath it. Try a Moyai.
tipsmod.tip.zombie_armor: Zombies have two base points of armor, even when they are not wearing any. Rude.
tipsmod.tip.undead_helmet: Undead mobs will not burn in daylight if they are wearing a helmet. Typically.
tipsmod.tip.iron_golem_heal: Iron Golems can be healed by giving them iron ingots, or a warm hug. Don't steal from them.
tipsmod.tip.turtle_shell: Turtles only drop scutes when a baby grows into an adult. Many scaly mobs follow this behavior.
tipsmod.tip.animal_growing: Feeding baby animals will make them grow up sooner. Don't poison your baby animals.
tipsmod.tip.blaze_snowball: Blazes take damage from snowballs. Snowball fight!
tipsmod.tip.biome_bonemeal: Using bone meal on grass blocks can give different types of flowers per biome.
tipsmod.tip.biome_fishing: Fishing in a Jungle can give you different items compared to fishing in other biomes.
tipsmod.tip.fishing_resources: Fishing is a great way to get facinating enchanted books.
tipsmod.tip.boat_jump: By placing a boat in lava you can make a temporary platform. Sort of.
tipsmod.tip.creeper_cat: Creepers are afraid of cats and will run away from them. Wonder why.
tipsmod.tip.water_grass: Water can quickly break grass patches, but knives will yield straw at the cost of durability.
tipsmod.tip.gravity_torch: Falling blocks like sand and gravel instantly break when falling onto a torch.
tipsmod.tip.string_wool: String can be crafted in a 2x2 to make wool, and cut back into string using a cutting board.
tipsmod.tip.barrel: Barrels are a convenient earlygame alternative to chests. Cloud chests are convenient later.
tipsmod.tip.job_site_dimension: Villagers lose their job site when changing dimensions. Continuity error.
tipsmod.tip.villager_sweat: Villagers sweat when trying to trade with them during a raid. I wonder why?
tipsmod.tip.wandering_invis: Wandering traders drink invisibility potions at night. That doesn't stall their demise.
tipsmod.tip.baby_panda_slimeball: Baby Pandas have a 0.1% chance to drop a slimeball after they sneeze. Achoo
tipsmod.tip.fortress_triangulation: You can triangulate stronghold locations by summoning eyes of ender from two different locations and tracking where they intersect.
tipsmod.tip.creeper_drops_disc: If a Skeleton's or Stray's arrow kills a Creeper, the Creeper drops a random music disc. There are so many unique ways of obtaining them!
tipsmod.tip.mooshroom_lightning: A red mooshroom will become a brown mooshroom, and a brown mooshroom will become a red one, when struck by lightning.
tipsmod.tip.bed_explode: Trying to sleep in other dimensions will end poorly.
tipsmod.tip.fall_damage_blocks: Some blocks like water and hay can reduce fall damage.
tipsmod.tip.bed_respawn: Sleeping in a bed will set your spawn point. It gives ~1000 blocks of guarenteed respawning there, beyond will be closer to your death.
tipsmod.tip.ore_tiers: Some ores have a minimum required pickaxe tier to mine them.
tipsmod.tip.sponge_bucket: Wet Sponge can be dried in a furnace by cooking it. If there is an empty bucket in the fuel slot the bucket will catch the water!
tipsmod.tip.coarse_to_dirt: Coarse Dirt can be converted into normal dirt using a hoe.
tipsmod.tip.enderman_blocks: Enderman can move blocks like dirt, sand, and TNT!
tipsmod.tip.dragon_blocks: Iron Bars, End Stone, and Obsidian are immune to damage from the Ender Dragon.
tipsmod.tip.piglin_repellent: Piglins are scared of soul fire blocks including the Soul Torch and Soul Lantern.
tipsmod.tip.portal_trick: By using water and lava buckets you can make an easy nether portal.
tipsmod.tip.blaze_fuel: Blaze rods are good fuel for furnaces.
tipsmod.tip.goat_milk: Goats can be milked using a bucket.
tipsmod.tip.mean_goats: Be careful around goats. They like to push players and other animals off cliffs. Collect their horns, though!
tipsmod.tip.dripstone_lava: Pointed dripstone below lava will slowly drip lava particles. This can be used to fill a cauldron.
tipsmod.tip.bucket_friends: Fish and Axolotls can be safely picked up using buckets.
tipsmod.tip.bucket_rename: Renaming a bucket with a mob inside will rename that mob as well.
tipsmod.tip.axolotl_food: Axolotls like to eat tropical fish.
tipsmod.tip.wax_copper: Honeycombs can be used to wax copper blocks. This prevents them from oxidizing.
tipsmod.tip.freezing_leather: Leather armor can protect against freezing damage.
tipsmod.tip.azalea_caves: Azalea trees grow above the lush cave biomes.
tipsmod.tip.end_dimension: You cannot leave the end dimension without defeating the ender dragon.. or dying...  can you?
tipsmod.tip.hitting_obsidian: It takes roughly 4 minutes to break an obsidian block by hand.
tipsmod.tip.sitting_pets: Sitting pets will remain seated when sinking in water until they drown or you right-click them.
tipsmod.tip.snow_golem_trail: You can harvest infinite snowballs from a snow golem's trail.
tipsmod.tip.mushroom_placement: Mushrooms can only be placed on blocks where there's no direct sunlight.
tipsmod.tip.mushroom_biome_spawns: Hostile mobs cannot spawn in a mushroom biome.
tipsmod.tip.shear_mooshroom: You can shear a mooshroom to turn it into a normal cow.
tipsmod.tip.peaceful_tnt: TNT cannot damage players in peaceful mode.
tipsmod.tip.weather_sleep: Sleeping will no longer clear up the sky and stop storm or rain.
tipsmod.tip.joke.combat: Zombies dislike it when you stab them with a sword. Very rude.
tipsmod.tip.joke.swim: If you stay under water too long you may drown.
tipsmod.tip.joke.lava: Like any items, buckets will burn in lava, but not when it is IN the bucket.
tipsmod.tip.joke.skulls: Wither Skeletons are known to lose their heads. There are ways to expediate this.
tipsmod.tip.endermites: There is a small chance that an Endermite will spawn when an Enderpearl lands.
gui.tips.list.title: Tips List
